channel.title: Whip bug
channel.description:
can anyone help me with my whip bug on my server...
if you put on the whip then your guy leans to the right and when you fight he is normal if anyone can help me out with this that would be really cool i dont know how i did this to the whip but i hate it if someone can help me out over teamviwer that would be cool
